segments.text: Can I have my check , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here it is . 350 Yuan all together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May son adores my new hairstyle so I suppose it is worth it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hearing you say that is a big reward for us . And here is the receipt .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait ! Congratulations ! You are the lucky customer of our anniversary celebration .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , it's surprising . So what do I get ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can have a free facial and then make up free for you . Do you want it now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Probably not . Doing that will probably take another three hours which I can't afford now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is our number . Call us when you are ready to come .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean I should make an appointment ahead of time ?
segments.speaker: S1
